resources.string: "Thank you for using the Covid-19 contact tracing application. This app will allow you, your friends and family to stay safe during these difficult times through the use of private and secure tracking of the corona virus. \n\n To get started please enter your details below : "

By checking this box you accept the local use of your bluetooth data for corona virus tracking purposes. (THIS IS A TEST AGREEMENT, THIS IS NOT AT ALL AN AUTHENTIC OR LEGAL AGREEMENT AT THIS POINT IN DEVELOPMENT)
QR code for easy scanning of personal details and status.
Please tick any of the symptoms that you are experiencing below, if you are experiencing a symptom that is not listed then please enter it in the \'Additional symptoms\' field.
You are currently not likely to have corona virus. You are safe to go outside as long as you follow social distancing and any additional rules provided by the government.
You potentially have corona virus. You were exposed to someone within contraction radius that is showing symptoms. Stay indoors for two weeks unless you show no symptoms after the first week.
You are likely to have contracted the corona virus from exposure to someone showing symptoms. Please stay indoors for two weeks. Call 111 if you have any health concerns.
